to tennesse and mississipi and the carolinas florida and alabama and georgia were all behind ya we came a long way but we got plenty to roll thats when the flood waters came they shot holes in our boat i be waking in the dreams screaming shotgun to the head of a demon could have left it breathin but the responsibility was leanin i came all the way for the truth tell my people i love you and my black and white flag is telling the government fuck you
